Text: With Vision is the second full-length album release by Place of Skulls.

Triplets:<With Vision
1:
--------------------
Text: With Vision:  The album was released in 2003 on the Southern Lord Records label.
Triplets:<With Vision
2:
--------------------
Text: With Vision:  The recording of this album was marked by numerous personnel changes before the final staff was assembled.
Triplets:<With Vision
3:
--------------------
<Text: With Vision:  This is the only Place of Skulls album to feature Scott Weinrich (of The Obsessed, Saint Vitus, Spirit Caravan fame) on vocals and second guitar, as he left soon after to concentrate on The Hidden Hand.>
Triplets:<Scott Weinrich
